tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Come explain to my 8 year old child why she can‚Äôt play outside without gagging and having coughing attacks, your suppose to protect us and it seems your just laughing at us. Enough is enough now we‚Äôre not dealing with this smell anymore. SORT IT OUT
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Why do they need to monitor it??! Go outside and use your nose, done.
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC No you are not at all, people are suffering physical side effects now time to act
@NewsNBC @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids Most of the houses in Silverdale were built well before the landfill was there

@StinkStopthe I bet that guy hopes the @EnvAgency would actually act but he‚Äôs lucky,they replied to him apologising!Normally they forget to switch the monitor on, they forget to give a reference,they forget to reply to emails,they forget to regulate @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @AaronBell4NUL

@EmmaHowardBoyd @AldersgateGrp @COP26 @GFI_green @EnvAgency @WRIClimate @GCAdaptation @ShareAction @BusinessGreen @ftenergy Good words - Now you could start by properly resourcing and training your investigators - or buy some in to deal with out of control sewage pollution - this is an emergency and you have depleted the front line of your Agency, why?..
